ext_desc.message: Simple speed dial bookmarks page, including search, add, edit, delete and dragging bookmarks.

placeholder_input_customstyle.message: Enter your custom CSS(For advanced users)

url_field_tip.message: Enter URL or leave it blank if you want to create the folder

confirm_delete_images.message: Are you sure? All local images will be deleted

confirm_delete_bookmark.message: Are you sure you want to delete the bookmark ?

confirm_delete_folder.message: Are you sure you want to delete the folder and all its contents ?

confirm_restore_default_settings.message: Are you sure you want to restore default settings ?

confirm_clear_sync_settings.message: Are you sure you want to delete all previously synchronized data to start fresh ?

confirm_sync_remote_settings.message:
You have previously synchronized data!!
Do you want to overwrite your current local settings with your previously saved remote settings?

notice_cant_find_id.message: Cant find folder by id. Maybe you have not synced bookmarks

alert_create_fail_bookmark.message:
- Adding a new Folder only requires a Title 
- Adding a new Bookmark requires both a Title and a URL

alert_update_fail_bookmark.message:
Editing an existing Bookmark requires both a Title and a valid URL in Chrome

 For example, valid URL's start with: 
 - http:// 
 - https:// 
 - ftp://

alert_file_type_fail.message:
Bad file type
Valid file type (jpg | jpeg | png | webp)

not_found_text.message: Can not find the folder by id. You may not have synchronized bookmarks, or you deleted | moved this folder.

show_header_bar.message: Show search bar and folder selection

show_create_column.message: Show column for adding a bookmark

show_favicon.message: Show the Favicon next to the title

open_link_newtab.message: Open bookmark in a new tab

auto_generate_thumbnail.message: Generating a thumbnail when creating a bookmark

thumbnail_help.message: [URL] token will be replaced by the speed dial URL

careful_change.message: Be careful if you want to change this option

reset_local_default.message: Reset Local Settings to Default Values

thumbnails_update_warn.message: Updating thumbnails can affect performance (depending on the number of bookmarks in a folder and computer performance)

folder_preview.message: Thumbnails of sites on a folder instead of an icon

folder_preview_description.message: While this setting is enabled, thumbnails of 4 random sites from the folder will be displayed instead of the icon or custom picture.

backup_settings_description.message: Backup only for extension settings, excluding bookmarks and images

without_confirmation.message: Do not ask for confirmation when deleting

thumbnails_update_delay_note.message: It can be useful when the page content is loading for a long time. The longer the delay, the longer the wait

close_tab_after_adding_bookmark.message: Automatically closing a tab if you have added it to bookmarks

close_tab_after_adding_bookmark_note.message: Only when adding via the context menu

transferring_thumbnails_notification.message: Transferring thumbnails from the file system to storage. After that, the visual bookmarks page will be reloaded.

move_to_start.message: Move a bookmark to the top of the list inside a folder

bookmarks_sorting_warning.message: Drag-and-drop sorting will be disabled if one of the sorting options is selected
